MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW6 postcode area of Tarporley, affecting properties in Bunbury and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.55PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by third party damage on the underground cable network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 6.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.42PM on 18th March 2021.
